must_have: Specify a time of day for pick-up that works best for me
Set up automatic refills for convenience
Request to have my prescription filled at a specific location
nice_to_have: Have the option to change pharmacies without losing prescription history
Receive a reminder notification three days before the prescription is due for refill
Integrate prescription refills with my health tracking app
Get my prescription delivered to my home address
deal_breakers: The pharmacy requires a payment upfront that I can't afford right now.
The dosage on the prescription needs to be adjusted but I can't contact the doctor.

technical: Something about the pharmacy system that works well
I think I need a good app for this
Maybe a feature that links to my doctor, but I'm not sure how
non_technical: It would be good if I could just walk in and get it

must_meet: The prescription should be ready when I go to pick it up
